prompts: Create a cute, round Pokemon with pink body and green leaf accents.
Imagine a small Pokemon that loves to float in the air with cheerful expressions.
Generate a whimsical grass-type Pokemon with a playful personality and vibrant colors.
Design an adorable creature that thrives in sunny meadows and has a leaf on its head.
Show me a tiny Pokemon known for its joyful nature and connection to nature.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a fluffy ball with a green sprout on top.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies happiness and is often found in grassy areas.

distinctive_features: Leaf sprout on top of the head
